name: Different Subsets For All Tuples
description:
For a sequence a of n integers between 1 and m, inclusive, denote f(a) as the
number of distinct subsequences of a (including the empty subsequence). You
are given two positive integers n and m. Let S be the set of all sequences of
length n consisting of numbers from 1 to m. Compute the sum f(a) over all a in
S modulo 10^9 + 7. Input The only line contains two integers n and m (1 ≤ n, m
≤ 10^6) — the number of elements in arrays and the upper bound for elements.
Output Print the only integer c — the desired sum modulo 10^9 + 7. Examples
Input 1 3 Output 6 Input 2 2 Output 14 Input 3 3 Output 174
